title: Task results indicators
description: Indicators produced from results of a task

userKey.description: Database key of the user that has produced the results

participantKey.description: Database key of the participant profile that has produced the results

studyKey.description: Database key of the study this task belongs to

producer.description: Name of the producer of the indicator

createdTS.description: Timestamp of when the task was created, either on the app or on the database, as ISO date string

updatedTS.description: Timestamp of when the task was last updated, either on the app or on the database, as ISO date string

taskIds.description: Ids of the tasks that have produced this indicator

taskResultsIds.description: Ids of the task results that have produced this indicator

indicators.description: Object containing the indicators, each indicator is a key-value pair, the value is an array of objects containing a date and a value

exampleIndicator.description: Example indicator, replace with actual indicators

date.description: Date of the indicator value, as ISO date string
